comment: Only few Naruto fans know, but this couple has the most tragic love story in Naruto. Yes, Izumi has only small screen time, and in the Series, it never show how she died. But if every Naruto fans will read Itachi's Shinden, Izumi was in a Tsukoyumi before she died. In her dream, she ended up marrying Itachi, having two kids, and grew old with Itachi for 70 or 80 years ( idk exactly, im not sure ) but only a few seconds from the real world. When Izumi came back to reality, the sword is already stabbed at her back, while itachi says  forgive me  She died joyful and smiling while saying  thank you Itachi . don't worry, it's okay. Even if i'm not here anymore, you'll always be in my heart I love you  ~ she decided to die in the hand of someone she loved. She deserved her dreams to be true, damn that Danzo. author: super-kage
comment: *Translation of Text from uchihasavior's tumblr page*  Itachi carefully monitored his breathing as he listened to the conversation just down the hall.  The room was lit by lamplight, coming from the corner.  It was two women talking. One voice, he knew very well. The other, was her mother.  To cause a distraction, he kicks the trash can down beside him.  â€œWhat was that?â€ The familiar voice asks her mother. â€œI donâ€™t know.â€ The other responds.  â€œIâ€™ll go check.â€  Avoiding suspicion, he quickly ducks into the hallway, entering the room from the side. Before the mother can scream upon noticing Itachi, he takes her out with his Sharingan.  â€œMother, the trash can was knocked overâ€¦.Itachi-kun?â€ Izumi saw her mother unconscious on the floor, and didnâ€™t understand. She was stupefied. â€œWhâ€¦why?â€  Itachi couldnâ€™t listen to Izumiâ€™s voice anymore.  So he gathered chakra into his eyes, and activated his Sharingan. Tsukuyomi.  Izumi was left deathly still, unable to fight it.  He put all of his focus into his genjutsu. Tsukuyomi was a type of genjutsu where Itachi had total control of space and time. This was the power Itachi awakened when he awoke his Mangekyo Sharingan.  Any time spent in the real world was a thousandth of a thousandth of a thousandth of the time spent in Tsukuyomi. ((1 divided by 1,000 three times totals 0.000000001/th of a second. This is one billionth of a second. One billion seconds is equal to about 31 years. In one second of real world time, Izumi lived over thirty years inside Tsukuyomi. ))  Itachi formed the genjutsu exactly to his desired image. Peace, in the village of Konoha. The clan is also peaceful, and tranquil. Itachi is free of all of his suffering. Izumi is beside him, smiling. Izumi is following his footsteps, also turning Chuunin. In this time, Itachi has already reached the Jounin rank. Itachi gives Izumi a promise ring. Izumi retires from being a shinobi.  A wedding.  The birth of their children.  ((Now, â€œhijosâ€ can mean boys AND children, since the masculine term for this is also the neutral term. So it basically says they had children.))  Raising their children.  The departure of their children.  Izumi, who gets older beside Itachi all the while.  From the time they came to know each other, 70 years had passed. Both their hair had gone completely white.  Izumi falls ill. Itachi cares for her.  The rest of their lives.  The Mangekyo Sharingan wastes a lot of chakra, and puts a large strain on its user. And as if he had just risen above water, Itachi was breathing heavily.  Itachi falls to his knees, infront of Izumi, while she is still smiling. (this wording was confusing, I can also see it being translated as she falls to her knees while smiling, because of the next line)  Itachi kept her body up, gripping her delicate shoulders tightly.  â€œThank youâ€¦â€ she says.  Izumiâ€™s voice was just like an old woman who had lived to be 80 years old.  â€œIt is I who owes thanks to youâ€¦â€  And Izumi, with a big smile, died peacefully.  The mind and body are inseparable. If the mind collapses, the body follows. Izumi died enveloped in happiness. Soon after, Itachi places her body on the floor gently, after sheâ€™s stopped moving. Itachi, meanwhile, struggles to stand.  The loss of chakra heâ€™d experienced was making his body tremble fiercely.  In his heart, he had decided to start the massacre with Izumi. By starting with her, he undid all of his doubts.  â€œThank you, Izumi.â€ ~~~~~~~

comment: Everybody is talking about how Naruto and Sasuke suffered. Yes, both lost their parents and felt like outcasts in their village, but later on they managed to get over that pain and built friendships and even families. But Itachi suffered his whole life. He experienced war, lost his best friend, his girlfriend, his parents and the love of his little brother. And even after his death, no one knows what he did to protect his village. Rather than being known as the hero he was, he is known as a traitor. He was the real hero of Naruto.

author: izzy
comment: Lmao. Uchiha itachi. A legend. Still people don't give him respect he deserves. People say itachi is over rated. Nigga no. People say minato or kakashi or obito or nagato had more sad past than itachi. I'm like wtf dude. Nagato's friend died. I mean that's sad but was he expecting that their group can keep succeeding without any disastrous results? His friends died and that's sad but not surprising. He is living in shinobi world. Not in a wonderland. People die. Loved ones die. Minato sacfriced himself n his wife for village. Yep that's very sad. But he went down as a hero. Whole village loved him. Kakashi... Now kakashi's story is nothing new. I mean no disrespect. I mean the era in which they were living and jobs they do as a shinobi you know risks along with it. His friends died. Infront of him. But there are countless shinobi with same fate,whose friends also died and then obito... Decided to go change the world and kill people cause his girlfriend died. Like dude he was retard. Was he expecting to always live happily in a chaotic world such as theirs? Where people kill others, hate and detest others. And now itachi.. Uchiha itachi. The kid who jumped a cliff at 6 to find the meaning of life. An unsung hero. Killed him own fucking clan! The guy could've choosen not to do it. But he did it for a greater good. He had to kill those whom he loved, whom he grew up with, whom he ate food with, whom he slept with.. For the Village.And the same village called him traitor, the kid who killed his own clan. He saw the war at very young age. He didn't wanted to see the same result. And guess what?? HE HAD ABSOLUTELY NO HATRED TOWARDS ANYONE??!!! HE DID NOT HATED THE VILLAGE OR BLAMED ANYONE FOR WHAT HAPPENED. He instead continued spying in akatsuki for sake of his village. And loved his brother more than anything. Died by his hand not just because he was sick but in order to make him stronger. AND GUESS WHAT? ITACHI COULD'VE STOPPED MADARA. YES I'M SAYING IT. I'M NOT SAYING HE COULD'VE KILLED OR BODIED MADARA. HE COULD'VE STOPPED HIS RAMPAGE. AND ITACHI WAS STRONGEST IN AKATSUKI.STRONGER THAN BOTH PAIN AND OBITO. Heck obito even said it himself. Itachi is Goat.

author: FX
comment: If Itachi solo killed his clan, then they're fucking noob enough to be a threat to Konoha. How was that Hokage worthy? Lol. He's got blood on his hands for noob reasons, now you want him to become Hokage? He didn't care about Konoha, he only cared about Sasuke. He followed Danzo's order in return of sparing sasuke, he didn't give a damn about Konoha. Danzo could have just do it himself killing Sasuke at the same time. And if he's Hokage worthy, he should have killed every member of akatsuki no matter what the cost. But nope all he cared about was Sasuke. You know what's Hokage worthy? Minato saving the village against 9 tails attack. Hiruzen defending Konoha against Orochimaru. Kakashi & Tsunade defending Konoha from Pain, and Naruto doesn't need explanations. Those are REAL threats. Not some clan that got wiped out by a single guy.
